name: .CREV File Extension
summary: Learn about .CREV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Adobe Captivate, a screen recording and eLearning product generation tool; contains a reviewable .SWF file that can be marked up and peer-reviewed using the Adobe Captivate Reviewer application, which is included with Adobe Captivate.

content: CREV files enable users to review and leave remarks about eLearning materials before they reach final draft. You can publish them from a .CPTX file in Captivate by selecting File → Collaborate → Send for Shared Review. Once published, reviewers can leave their comments using the Captivate Reviewer software.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
